name: Caldera Kite
description: A large monstrosity that can fly gracefully while emanating toxic effects and obscuring haze around it.
memorable: The ability to create a toxic cloud and evade opportunity attacks enhances its threat factor in combat.
goals: Typically seeks to incapacitate enemies through poison and mobility.
relations: May be found with other poisonous creatures or in hazardous environments.
environment: Often found in volcanic or toxic landscapes.
strengths: Exceptional mobility and immunities to acid, fire, and poison damage.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence and charisma, making it ineffective in strategy or social interactions.
attacks: Can perform Multiattacks with slashing and poisonous damage from its Wings and grapple with its Proboscis.
most_powerful_ability: Dust Cloud releases toxic gases affecting creatures in close proximity, causing severe poison damage and incapacitation.
senses: Possesses Firesight to see through smoke and a passive perception of 14.
skills: Has a basic skill in perception.
additional_information: Immunities to exhaustion and poisoned condition.
Grapples and restrains medium or smaller creatures.
Sulfuric Haze creates area denial through poison.
Does not provoke opportunity attacks when moving.
Can remain undetected in obscured environments.
